CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Geriatric Care Hospital?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Geriatric Care Hospital is arc {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Commdata_unity Health Center?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Commdata_unity Health Center is arc {Maternal and Child Health Center}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Commdata_unity Health Center} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Emergency Medical Center} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Geriatric Care Hospital to Maternal and Child Health Center in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Commdata_unity Health Center to Emergency Medical Center in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Commdata_unity Health Center to Maternal and Child Health Center in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Commdata_unity Health Center and Maternal and Child Health Center in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Commdata_unity Health Center and Maternal and Child Health Center is {125}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Geriatric Care Hospital and Maternal and Child Health Center in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Geriatric Care Hospital and Maternal and Child Health Center is {62}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Commdata_unity Health Center?
SC.A: The total flow output from Commdata_unity Health Center is {986}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Maternal and Child Health Center?
SC.A: The total flow input by Maternal and Child Health Center is {193}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 274? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {641} from {Commdata_unity Health Center} to {Emergency Medical Center}, a flow of {328} from {Emergency Medical Center} to {Commdata_unity Health Center}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 86? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {80} from {Geriatric Care Hospital} to {Emergency Medical Center}, a flow of {68} from {Geriatric Care Hospital} to {Maternal and Child Health Center}, a flow of {62} from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Geriatric Care Hospital}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 101 and 144? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {125} from {Commdata_unity Health Center} to {Maternal and Child Health Center}, a flow of {109} from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Commdata_unity Health Center}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Maternal and Child Health Center to Geriatric Care Hospital or from Maternal and Child Health Center to Commdata_unity Health Center?
NC.A: The flow from {Maternal and Child Health Center} to {Commdata_unity Health Center} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Maternal and Child Health Center to Commdata_unity Health Center, from Commdata_unity Health Center to Geriatric Care Hospital, or from Commdata_unity Health Center to Emergency Medical Center?
NC.A: The flow from {Commdata_unity Health Center} to {Emergency Medical Center} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Commdata_unity Health Center}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Commdata_unity Health Center} and {Emergency Medical Center}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Commdata_unity Health Center, Arc Emergency Medical Center, Arc Geriatric Care Hospital, Arc Maternal and Child Health Center}.
